original_text: Also Jehoiada appointed the offices of the house of the Lord by the hand of the priests the Levites, whom David had distributed in the house of the Lord, to offer the burnt offerings of the Lord, as it is written in the law of Moses, with rejoicing and with singing, as it was ordained by David.
korean_text: 여호야다가 여호와의 전의 직원들을 세워 레위 제사장의 수하에 맡기니 이들은 다윗이 전에 그들의 반열을 나누어서 여호와의 전에서 모세의 율법에 기록한 대로 여호와께 번제를 드리며 자기들의 정한 규례대로 즐거이 부르고 노래하게 하였던 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: Also Jehoiada appointed the offices of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 여호야다가 주의 집의 직분을 임명하고

sentences.original_text: by the hand of the priests the Levites
whom David had distributed in the house of the Lord
to offer the burnt offerings of the Lord
as it is written in the law of Moses
as it was ordained by David
